metadata.title: AI Cruiser
metadata.author: R4V3-0N, Chrono Vortex, and Vertaalfout
metadata.description:
THIS MOD HAS DEPENDENCIES! Make sure to patch Vertex Tags and Utility Functions first! (links bellow)
This mod adds a new race of AI hardlight Avatars from a distant universe which will eventually be developed upon further, both with type B and C layouts as well as eventually events and lore inspired by the AI Avatar race from Captains Edition and Hyperspace by Sleeper Service.
This sample includes: - AI Cruiser type A - 5 New Weapons - Effector mk I, a projector that hacks into enemy systems - Auto Beam, a beam that after firing drops to a quick 2.5 second cooldown - Splitter Focus Beam II, a 'flak beam' that fires 4 focus beams - EMP Device, a weapon that fires a projectile that knocks down 2 layers of shields, while dealing 2 ion damage on system room hit. - Ion Bust Beam, which can deal double damage on ionized rooms but in doing so clears the ion effect. - 2 New Drones - Interceptor Microfighter, a drone that is technically more sentient than you. An evasive drone that focuses fire on enemy defence drones before targeting the ship. - Shock Microfighter, piloted by an obnoxious avatar, this drone targets enemy systems with its light EMP device repeatedly while evading enemy fire. - New Race: AI Avatar's, a synthetic race of disposable hardlight avatars with many immunities - New Augments - Hologram Emitter, an augment that lets you produce an AI hologram when one perishes at empty beacons - Sentient Combat computer, improves most systems by 5% - Rerouted Insulation, gives the ship a 80% ion resistance while all crew onboard are more susceptable to stuns.
Download Vertex: https://github.com/ChronoVortex/FTL-HS-Vertex/releases
